bibl.title: A Bilingual Account from Late Ptolemaic Tebtunis. P. Leiden RMO Inv. No. F 1974/7.52. Avec résumé en anglais
bibl.note: Daily account of money payments for goods and services in the month of Hathyr. The accounts (in Demotic with Greek summaries) probably derive from a public office leased from the Ptolemaic administration. Tebtynis, early 1st century B.C.
bibl.seg: MUHS Brian and Jacco DIELEMAN, A Bilingual Account from Late Ptolemaic Tebtunis. P. Leiden RMO Inv. No. F 1974/7.52. Avec résumé en anglais.

Daily account of money payments for goods and services in the month of Hathyr. The accounts (in Demotic with Greek summaries) probably derive from a public office leased from the Ptolemaic administration. Tebtynis, early 1st century B.C.
